Articles.Content: It would be a great idea to add a auto walk key in the game that way we don't have to hold W key when walking on planets and can move away from the computer if it includes a long walk.
Users with Logitech gaming keyboards can make a macro for exactly that.
Do trim controls work in EVA? I know they do for rovers, allowing a sort of cruise control, but I've never tried it with a kerbal.

Is that often needed?

I never even concidered going far away from my landingspot

Is that often needed?

I never even concidered going far away from my landingspot

It is needed sometimes. A walk even of 2km is quite a long walk and implementing something so basic should not be hard to the developers.

That falls under the scope of something I would never even concider, which is why I asked
I don't know, I've landed rescue ships far enough away from the rescued that a fairly long hike was called for.
